metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39591 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in swftools through 20200710. A NULL pointerdereference exists in the function swf_GetShapeBoundingBox() located inswfshape.c. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
